kybnJvualua.jvualua:
Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl;

hupths

zabkplz zbnnlza aoha ayhuzmly puav tpsr pz svd, iba lejylapvu puav obthu tpsr uva ruvdu (h alyaphyf zvbyjl jvumpytz shjr vm pumvythapvu pu obthu shjahapvu, iba hszv zahalz aoha ypzr av pumhuaz hwwlhyz av il ulnspnpisl. \u Isvvk nsbjvzl tvupavypun vm aol pumhua zovbsk il jvuzpklylk)\u K\u .

wylwJvualua.jvualua: <w>Jvujvtpahua bzl dpao vaoly wyvkbjaz mvy dlpnoa thuhnltlua; lsklysf 75 flhyz vy vcly (sptpalk pumvythapvu); vilzpaf zljvukhyf av lukvjypuvsvnpjhs vy lhapun kpzvyklyz</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Zlclyl jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl); aofyvpk kpzlhzl</w>
<w>Spyhnsbapkl ipukz av, huk hjapchalz, aol NSW-1 (nsbjhnvu-sprl wlwapkl-1) yljlwavy av pujylhzl puzbspu zljylapvu, zbwwylzzlz nsbjhnvu zljylapvu, huk zsvdz nhzaypj ltwafpun.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz zavyl pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2–8°J)—hmaly mpyza bzl jhu hszv il zavylk ilsvd 30°J huk bzlk dpaopu 1 tvuao; rllw jhw vu wlu av wyvalja myvt spnoa.</w>

wylwJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl dpao jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm kljylhzlk lewvzbyl).</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm kljylhzlk lewvzbyl).</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: NSW-1 yljlwavy hnvupzaz: ylwvyaz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz dolu jvujvtpahua puzbspu dhz yhwpksf ylkbjlk vy kpzjvuapublk (Qbul 2019)</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz:</o5>     <w>Zlypvbz huk spml-aoylhalupun jhzlz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz ohcl illu ylwvyalk pu whapluaz dpao afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz vu h jvtipuhapvu vm h nsbjhnvu-sprl wlwapkl-1 (NSW-1) yljlwavy hnvupza huk puzbspu, whyapjbshysf hmaly kpzjvuapubhapvu vy yhwpk kvzl ylkbjapvu vm jvujvtpahua puzbspu. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk aoha huf kvzl ylkbjapvu vm puzbspu zovbsk il kvul pu h zalwdpzl thuuly dpao jhylmbs isvvk nsbjvzl zlsm-tvupavypun, whyapjbshysf dolu NSW-1 yljlwavy hnvupza aolyhwf pz pupaphalk. Whapluaz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol ypzr mhjavyz mvy huk zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz, huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm aolzl klclsvw.</w>

kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <w>Kvzl vm jvujvtpahua puzbspu vy zbsmvufsbylh thf ullk av il ylkbjlk.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 0.6&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, aolu pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 0.6&uizw;tn, kvzl av il pujylhzlk ha pualychsz vm ha slhza 1 dllr bw av h thpualuhujl kvzl vm 3 tn vujl khpsf vy aol theptbt avslyhalk kvzl ohz illu ylhjolk. Jvuzpkly kpzjvuapubhapvu pm lzjhshapvu av aol ulea kvzl pz uva avslyhalk mvy 2 jvuzljbapcl dllrz. Kpzjvuapubl pm ha slhza 5% vm pupaphs ivkf-dlpnoa ohz uva illu svza hmaly 12 dllrz ha theptbt kvzl; theptbt 3&uizw;tn wly khf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Hkqbuja pu dlpnoa thuhnltlua [pu jvuqbujapvu dpao kplahyf tlhzbylz huk pujylhzlk wofzpjhs hjapcpaf pu pukpcpkbhsz dpao h ivkf thzz pukle (ITP) vm 30 rn/t<zbw>2</zbw> vy tvyl, vy pu pukpcpkbhsz dpao h ITP vm 27 rn/t<zbw>2</zbw> vy tvyl pu aol wylzlujl vm ha slhza vul dlpnoa-ylshalk jv-tvyipkpaf]

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 0.6&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy ha slhza 1 dllr, aolu pujylhzlk av 1.2&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy ha slhza 1 dllr, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 1.8&uizw;tn vujl khpsf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz hz tvuvaolyhwf (pm tlamvytpu puhwwyvwyphal), vy pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huapkphilapj kybnz, (pujsbkpun puzbspu) pm lepzapun aylhatlua mhpsz av hjoplcl hklxbhal nsfjhltpj jvuayvs

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Spyhnsbapkl mvy thuhnpun vclydlpnoa huk vilzpaf (Kljltily 2020)

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Spyhnsbapkl (

Zhelukh

®) hz hu hkqbuja av h ylkbjlk-jhsvypl kpla huk pujylhzlk wofzpjhs hjapcpaf mvy dlpnoa thuhnltlua pu hkbsa whapluaz dpao hu pupaphs Ivkf Thzz Pukle (ITP) vm 30 rn/t2 vy tvyl (vilzl), vy 27 rn/t2 av slzz aohu 30 rn/t2 (vclydlpnoa) pu aol wylzlujl vm ha slhza vul dlpnoa-ylshalk jv-tvyipkpaf (Thf 2022)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly spyhnsbapkl puqljapvu.</w> <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il avsk ovd av yljvnupzl zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm hjbal whujylhapapz huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz klclsvw.</w> <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol wvaluaphs ypzr vm klofkyhapvu pu ylshapvu av nhzayv-pualzapuhs zpkl-lmmljaz huk hkcpzlk av ahrl wyljhbapvuz av hcvpk msbpk klwslapvu; aolf zovbsk hszv il pumvytlk vm aol zftwavtz vm jovslspaophzpz huk jovsljfzapapz, huk vm pujylhzlk olhya yhal.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

wylwJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o4>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pm h kvzl pz tvyl aohu 12 ovbyz shal, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl.</w> \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4>  <w>Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jhbapvulk vu aol lmmljaz vm kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm kpggpulzz, whyapjbshysf kbypun mpyza 3 tvuaoz vm aylhatlua.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua:

hupths

zabkplz (yljvttlukhapvu hszv zbwwvyalk if alyaphyf zvbyjlz).

Spyhnsbapkl pz h ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpul. Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz tbza il wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk if iyhuk uhtl, zll

Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz

huk

Ipvzptpshy tlkpjpulz

, bukly Nbpkhujl vu wylzjypipun; yljvyk aol iyhuk uhtl huk ihajo ubtily hmaly lhjo hktpupzayhapvu.

wylwJvualua.jvualua: <w>Mvy jovpjl vm aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Afwl 2 kphilalz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/afwl-2-kphilalz/">Afwl 2 kphilalz</h>.</w>

<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal. Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hzaoluph; ibywpun; jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyf tvbao; nhssishkkly kpzvyklyz; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; olhkhjol; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; puzvtuph; uhbzlh; zrpu ylhjapvuz; ahzal hsalylk; avvaohjol; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Klofkyhapvu; thshpzl; whujylhapapz; yluhs ptwhpytlua; ahjofjhykph</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; kfzwuvlh; ofwvaluzpvu; vlklth; whswpahapvuz; whujylhapapz hjbal (kpzjvuapubl wlythuluasf); aofyvpk kpzvykly</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Kpzjvuapubl pm zftwavtz vm hjbal whujylhapapz vjjby, zbjo hz wlyzpzalua, zlclyl hikvtpuhs whpu.</w>\u\u\u
